name: Amazon App Mesh
short: A service mesh that provides application-level networking for microservices running on AWS.
description: Amazon App Mesh is a service that makes it easy to manage and monitor microservices applications. It provides an intelligent network that routes requests and traffic to the correct services, allowing developers to control and manage how traffic is routed. It also provides consistent observability, enabling developers to monitor service health and performance, and quickly identify and fix issues. App Mesh also provides service discovery features, allowing developers to quickly and easily connect services together for a seamless experience.
